name: auth-service
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.build-go: cd app && go build && rm app
scripts.build-node: npm run symlink && npm run gen && tsc --noEmit
scripts.build: npm run build-go && npm run build-node && npm run build-sam
scripts.deploy:live: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env live
scripts.watch: nodemon -e go,graphql,yaml.json,ts -i generated__graphql.go -i __generated__ --signal SIGINT -x 'npm run start || exit 1'
